channel.title: 317 help asap
channel.description:
i was wondering what the color codes are or atleast for red because i made a command where i log in it says so and so has logged in and it works for owners+ so i wanna make it where it says that but with a red color and has a admin crown next to it can some1 please give me a code???
all i need is the color code for red and the code for a admin crown
thanks please help dont flame
